title: 4.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Look at the List of flowers given below:
flowers = [‘Rose’, ‘Lily’, ‘Sunflower’, ‘Tulip’, ‘Daffodil’]
Ask a user to enter the name of any flower. If the name entered by the user exists in the flower list, display the message - The flower is in the list else display The flower is not in the list. Provide the algorithm and flowchart for the program.
Hint: Use the membership operator to solve this question.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
